content: Great article Elle Kaplan.These points are really toxic points which can prevent any one to reach success in life.I want to add one more point.Although this point can come under “trying to please everybody” ,but it does deserve a separate mention. Stop saying “YES” to everything.This is the biggest weakness which not only hurts our productivity but also our self esteem when we fail to do all we had committed to do.Great Leaders understand their limitations and constraints and have mastered the art of saying NO at the right time.
